trackOrder.title: Track Your Order
trackOrder.label: Enter your tracking ID
trackOrder.error: Failed to track order. Please check your tracking ID and try again.
trackOrder.description: Enter your tracking ID to check the status of your order
trackOrder.notFound: Order not found. Please check your tracking ID and try again.
trackOrder.helpText: You can find your tracking ID in your order confirmation email or in your account orders.

faq1.question: How do I place an order?
faq1.answer: Simply browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You'll need to provide your shipping information and payment details to complete the order.

faq2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq2.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and cash on delivery for orders within Pakistan.

faq3.question: How long does shipping take?
faq3.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days, while express shipping takes 1-2 business days within major cities.

faq4.question: What is your return policy?
faq4.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be unused and in their original packaging. Some items may be final sale.

faq5.question: How do I track my order?
faq5.answer: You can track your order using the tracking ID provided in your order confirmation email. Simply enter the tracking ID in the Track Order section above.

requirements.title: Seller Requirements
requirements.description: To start selling, you need to meet these requirements:
items: Acceptance of seller terms and conditions

benefits.title: Benefits of Selling on Tijarah.pk
items: Reach millions of buyers across Asia

items.question: How do I start selling?
items.answer: Create an account, fill in your seller profile, and list your first product.

items.question: What are the seller fees?
items.answer: Seller fees vary by category. Please check your category's fee structure.

items.question: How long does it take to get paid?
items.answer: Payments are processed within 7-10 business days after order completion.

items.question: Can I edit my product listing?
items.answer: Yes, you can edit your listings anytime from your seller dashboard.

items.question: What if a buyer returns a product?
items.answer: Returns are handled based on your return policy. We provide full support during the process.

contact.title: Need Help?
contact.description: Contact our seller support team for any questions about selling on Tijarah.pk
